metadata.title: CVE-2016-3908 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The Lock Settings Service in Android 6.x before 2016-10-01 and 7.0 before2016-10-01 allows attackers to remove a device's PIN or password, andconsequently gain privileges, via a crafted application, aka internal bug30003944.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
